headline.main: Expelled North Korean Envoy Says Malaysia's 'Extreme Measures' Harmed Ties
headline.print_headline: Expelled North Korean Envoy Says Malaysia's 'Extreme Measures' Harmed Ties

lead_paragraph: The North Korean ambassador expelled by Malaysia in a row over the investigation into the murder of the North Korean leader's half-brother said on Monday that the Malaysian government's actions had harmed bilateral ties.
snippet: The North Korean ambassador expelled by Malaysia in a row over the investigation into the murder of the North Korean leader's half-brother said on Monday that the Malaysian government's actions had harmed bilateral ties....
